projects.name: Guadalajara Web Camp
description: My first personal project, part of the Complete Web Development course I took in 2020.
The project serves as a framework for the Guadalajara Web Camp showing its organization, guest speakers, schedules and presents the possibility of purchasing tickets and other souvenirs of the event.
